title: WTT or Buy this T213-1 Huggins! Do you own it?
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: WTT or Buy this T213-1 Huggins! Do you own it?
posts.post_content:
Hey you all,
This T213-1 Huggins sold in Goodwin back in 2011. I figure chances are pretty good that it currently lives with one of you all. Let me know if he is around or if I could talk you into moving it via trade or cash. If you seen this card or know the owner, I’d appreciate a lead.

Thanks for looking,
Bob

Drop me a PM if you can help me with this one.
